payload.summary: Your comprehensive genetic analysis reveals important insights about your health predispositions, ancestry, and fitness characteristics. This report covers 150+ health conditions, detailed ancestry breakdown, and personalized fitness recommendations based on your unique genetic profile.
key_findings: Increased risk for Type 2 Diabetes (1.3x average risk)
85% European ancestry with diverse regional origins
Fast-twitch muscle fiber dominance for power athletics
payload.recommendations: Based on your genetic profile, we recommend: 1) Regular glucose monitoring and diabetes prevention strategies, 2) Maintain heart-healthy lifestyle, 3) Consider genetic counseling for family planning, 4) Focus on power-based fitness activities, 5) Moderate caffeine intake is well-tolerated.

payload.summary: Your health-focused genetic analysis identifies key genetic variants that may impact your health risks and medication responses. This clinical-grade report provides actionable insights for you and your healthcare provider.
key_findings: Elevated risk for Alzheimer's Disease (APOE4 carrier)
payload.recommendations: Discuss these findings with your healthcare provider. Consider: 1) Enhanced cognitive health monitoring, 2) Alternative anticoagulation if warfarin is prescribed, 3) Continue routine cancer screening, 4) Lactose-free diet may improve digestive comfort.

validation_notes.kit_id: Must be a valid DNA kit ID that exists in the system
validation_notes.category: Must be one of: ANCESTRY, HEALTH_RISK, CARRIER_STATUS, PHARMACOGENOMICS, TRAITS, FITNESS, WELLNESS
validation_notes.confidence_level: Must be one of: HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW
validation_notes.risk_score: Must be a number between 0 and 100 (or null)
validation_notes.report_type: Must be one of: PRELIMINARY, COMPREHENSIVE, UPDATED, CLINICAL
validation_notes.quality_score: Must be a number between 0 and 100 (or null)
